title: Please help ID this display font
content:
I am looking to identify the font for "FUSHIMI" in this banner. Any help would be very appreciated.

[http://www.fushimi88.com/banner.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106075433/http:/www.fushimi88.com/banner.jpg "http://www.fushimi88.com/banner.jpg")
